abstract: United Nations refugee agency suspends nonessential operations at the Dadaab refugee camp in Kenya after the kidnapping of two aid workers, attributed to the Shabab Islamist rebel group.
snippet: The United Nations refugee agency suspended nonessential operations at the Dadaab refugee camp as security forces scoured the area for two Spanish aid workers kidnapped there.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations refugee agency suspended nonessential operations at the Dadaab refugee camp as security forces scoured the area for two Spanish aid workers kidnapped there.
